ing: 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
1/4 cup lemon juice, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon soy sauce, or to taste
des: "Ceviche made with fresh, raw tuna chunks.  Great as an appetizer or side dish.  I learned this one from my grandparents and found it to be a winner among my college buddies."
ins: Cut tuna into 1/2 inch cubes, and place into a bowl.  Stir in the onion, green onions, ginger, jalapeno, lemon juice, and soy sauce; mix to combine.  Cover and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours.  Taste before serving and add more lemon juice or soy sauce as needed.
